channel.title: In need of a server/client with
channel.description:
Hello fellow Moparscaperians. :)
I'm currently bored out of my ass. So i need a server, just for me to play on. I'm requesting this cause i suck at coding, i admit it. o_o
I need a server/client with these items: Dragonfire Shield Staff of Light all (or some) male/female Ele clothing Gnome Scarf Flared Trousers Blessed Dragonhide Armour Armadyl Robe Leg Armadyl Robe Top Frost/Blue Dragon Mask
Now, i KNOW the Armadyl Robes and Dragon Masks is A LOT to ask for, but i see some people already made them 100% so it's worth a shot? :)
Please, if you have a server, post the SERVER and the CLIENT download links here.
no haterz please!

item.title: In need of a server/client with
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I Vain I:

Requests aren’t allowed.

Please use the downloads section or the search bar.

Read full topic
